orego.play

Interface Playable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DumpPlayer, Lgrf2Player, McPlayer, MctsPlayer, Player, RaveCovPlayer, RaveDynamicBiasPlayer, RavePlayer, ThreadedPlayer, WLSPlayer

    public interface Playable
    Interface used by orego.ui.Orego to interact with a player (e.g., an orego.play.Player).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int acceptMove(int p)
      Accepts the move if possible.
      int bestMove()
      Returns the best move for the color to play.
      double finalScore() 
      Board getBoard() 
      Set<String> getCommands()
      Returns the commands handled by this Player.
      Set<String> getGoguiCommands()
      Returns the GoGui commands handled by this Player.
      String handleCommand(String command, StringTokenizer arguments)
      Handles a nonstandard GTP command.
      void reset()
      Clears the board and does anything else necessary to start a new game.
      void setKomi(double komi) 
      void setProperty(String property, String value)
      Sets the given property to the given value.
      void setRemainingTime(int seconds)
      Adjusts the time per move based on the remaining time in the game.
      void setUpSgf(String filePath, int colorToPlay)
      Resets board, then plays a series of moves from an .sgf file.
      boolean undo()
      Undoes the last move if possible.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptMove

        int acceptMove(int p)
        Accepts the move if possible.
        Returns:
        one of the PLAY_... constants from orego.core.Board

      • bestMove

        int bestMove()
        Returns the best move for the color to play.

      • finalScore

        double finalScore()
        See Also:
        Board.finalScore()

      • getBoard

        Board getBoard()
        Returns:
        the board

      • getCommands

        Set<String> getCommands()
        Returns the commands handled by this Player. Subclasses should override this, invoke the super version, and add additional commands to the result before returning it.

      • getGoguiCommands

        Set<String> getGoguiCommands()
        Returns the GoGui commands handled by this Player. Subclasses should override this, invoke the super version, and add additional commands to the result before returning it.

      • handleCommand

        String handleCommand(String command,
                   StringTokenizer arguments)
        Handles a nonstandard GTP command. Returns the response String, or null if the command is an error (e.g., is not a known command).

      • reset

        void reset()
        Clears the board and does anything else necessary to start a new game.

      • setKomi

        void setKomi(double komi)
        See Also:
        Board.setKomi(double)

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(String property,
               String value)
                 throws UnknownPropertyException
        Sets the given property to the given value.
        Throws:
        UnknownPropertyException

      • setRemainingTime

        void setRemainingTime(int seconds)
        Adjusts the time per move based on the remaining time in the game. Note that this in in seconds, not milliseconds.

      • setUpSgf

        void setUpSgf(String filePath,
            int colorToPlay)
        Resets board, then plays a series of moves from an .sgf file.

      • undo

        boolean undo()
        Undoes the last move if possible.
        Returns:
        true if the undo succeeded.
